predicate.note: Frames file for 'interpret' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: passive
example.text: [His comments]-1 were interpreted [*-1] as a sign that higher interest rates are possible .
example.arg: as a sign that higher interest rates are possible

example.name: transitive
example.text: They-2 simply got carried away with [*-2] interpreting what the executive order banning assassinations really meant [*T*-1] .
example.arg: what the executive order banning assassinations really meant [*T*-1]

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Investors interpreted the KKR move as a desire [*ICH*-1] by the firm [*] to wash its hands of SCI TV .
example.arg: as a desire [*ICH*-1] by the firm [*] to wash its hands of SCI TV
